info.title: Tomorrow.io
info.description: Improve operational efficiency with the world's leading enterprise-grade weather service. Use our hyper-accurate weather data for endless use cases across all industries.

get.description: Retrieve comprehensive weather information for any location worldwide. Returns all core weather data automatically - no field selection needed. Premium: minutely forecasts (1m, 5m, 15m, 30m). Standard: hourly (120 hours) and daily (5 days) forecasts.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location for weather forecast. Supports coordinates (lat,lon), city names, US zip codes, UK postcodes.

parameters.name: timesteps
parameters.description: Time intervals for forecasts. Premium: 1m, 5m, 15m, 30m (minute-level). Standard: 1h (hourly), 1d (daily). Multiple values supported.

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: Unit system for response values (metric or imperial). Default is metric.

get.description: Retrieve current weather information for a location in minute-by-minute temporal resolution.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location for current weather. Supports coordinates (lat,lon), city names, US zip codes, UK postcodes.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of weather fields to include. If not specified, returns all available fields.

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: Unit system for response values. Default is metric.

get.description: Retrieve historical weather forecasts for your location, including hourly history for the last 24 hours, and daily history for the last day.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location for historical weather. Supports coordinates (lat,lon), city names, US zip codes, UK postcodes.

parameters.name: timesteps
parameters.description: Time intervals for historical data. Available: 1h (hourly), 1d (daily). Multiple values supported.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of weather fields to include. If not specified, returns all available fields.

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: Unit system for response values. Default is metric.

get.description: Query weather conditions by specifying the location, fields, timesteps, and the start time and end time (basic version using query parameters for lat/long locations only).

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: The weather data fields to retrieve.

post.description: Query weather conditions by specifying the location, fields, timesteps, and the start time and end time (advanced version supporting GeoJSON locations including polygons and polylines).

location.description: The location (can be lat,long string or GeoJSON).
location.title: Location

fields.description: The weather data fields to retrieve.
fields.title: Fields

updatedAt.description: When the alert was last updated.
updatedAt.title: Updated At

get.description: Retrieve a list of all configured weather alerts for proactive monitoring and notifications.

post.description: Create a new custom weather alert for proactive monitoring with configurable conditions and notifications.

conditions.description: Weather conditions that trigger the alert.
conditions.title: Conditions

get.description: Retrieve detailed configuration and status of a specific weather alert.

put.description: Update the configuration, conditions, or notification settings of an existing weather alert.

delete.description: Remove a weather alert and stop all associated monitoring and notifications.

post.description: Activate a weather alert to begin monitoring conditions and sending notifications.
Deactivate a weather alert to stop monitoring conditions and notifications temporarily.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all managed locations for weather monitoring and alerts.

post.description: Create a new managed location for weather monitoring, alerts, and asset tracking.

coordinates.description: The location coordinates in GeoJSON format.
coordinates.title: Coordinates

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific managed location.

put.description: Update the name, description, or coordinates of an existing managed location.

delete.description: Remove a managed location and unlink it from all associated alerts.

startTime.description: The start time of the interval.
startTime.title: Start Time

temperatureMin.description: Normal (average) daily minimum temperature over 20-year period.
temperatureMin.title: Temperature Min Normal

temperatureMax.description: Normal (average) daily maximum temperature over 20-year period.
temperatureMax.title: Temperature Max Normal

temperatureAvg.description: Normal (average) daily average temperature over 20-year period.
temperatureAvg.title: Temperature Average Normal

precipitationAccumulationSum.description: Normal daily precipitation accumulation over 20-year period.
precipitationAccumulationSum.title: Precipitation Normal

windSpeedAvg.description: Normal daily average wind speed over 20-year period.
windSpeedAvg.title: Wind Speed Normal

humidityAvg.description: Normal daily average humidity over 20-year period.
humidityAvg.title: Humidity Normal

get.description: Get 20-year climate patterns and statistical analysis (2000-2020) for long-term planning, research, and climate change analysis.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Location for climate normals (lat,long or address).

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of climate fields to retrieve.

timestep.description: The timestep of the historical timeline.
timestep.title: Timestep

startTime.description: The start time of the interval.
startTime.title: Start Time

post.description: Get comprehensive historical weather data since 2000 for trend analysis, model validation, and research applications.

fields.description: List of historical weather fields to include.
fields.title: Weather Fields

timesteps.description: List of timesteps for historical data.
timesteps.title: Timesteps

get.description: Get air pollution and air quality forecasts for health applications, environmental monitoring, and compliance tracking.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Location for air quality forecast (lat,long or address).

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of air quality fields.

get.description: Get current air pollution and air quality conditions for immediate health assessments and environmental monitoring.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Location for air quality data (lat,long or address).

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of air quality fields.

get.description: Get ocean and coastal weather forecasts for shipping, offshore operations, and coastal management applications.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of marine weather fields.

get.description: Get aviation-specific weather conditions for flight operations, airport management, and aviation safety applications.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of aviation weather fields.

get.description: Retrieve current and forecasted weather events for enhanced business intelligence and automated decision-making.

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of event types to filter (e.g., storm, precipitation, temperature).

parameters.name: severity
parameters.description: Minimum severity level (minor, moderate, major, extreme).

insights.description: Business insights derived from weather data.

get.description: Get AI-driven business insights and recommendations based on current and forecasted weather conditions.

parameters.name: industry
parameters.description: Industry sector for targeted insights (agriculture, construction, retail, logistics, energy).

get.description: Retrieve notification history and status for all weather alerts and automated triggers.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by notification status (sent, pending, failed).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of notifications to return.

time.description: The time for this route segment.
time.title: Time

post.description: Get detailed weather forecasts along a specific route for navigation, logistics, and travel planning.

coordinates.description: Route coordinates as array of [longitude, latitude] pairs.
coordinates.title: Route Coordinates

fields.description: Weather fields to include for route segments.
fields.title: Weather Fields

post.description: Sends JSON-RPC 2.0 requests to the Model Context Protocol server for tool execution and capability management.

id.description: Request identifier matching the original request.
id.title: Request ID

result.description: Successful response data from the MCP method.
result.title: Result

id.description: Request identifier, or null if request ID could not be determined.
id.title: Request ID

error.description: Error information following JSON-RPC 2.0 error specification.
error.title: Error

code.description: Numeric error code indicating the type of error.
code.title: Error Code
